Text: Sorry for the delay.  I tried to upload this weeks ago and I kept getting a form error over and over and over, until I finally found the thread.  See nfo file for full description.  Thanks.

I have discovered how to download only the files (episodes) you want.
Click download as normal
once it appears in utorrent window, click on it to highlight it, then go down on the L/hand side and click on files, the individual files will appear in the lower window, R/click on the ones you want to remove and select 'do not download'
you will see it skip these selected files
Hope this is a help to everyone
It might not help much for this torrent, since there are only 5 files and 4 are ISOs and 1 is just nfo. ;)
